body_html:
I'd like to +1 migrating to the standard 4-space indentation. I've seen quite a few places in the tensorflow codebase with a mix of 2-space and 4-space indentations in the same file. This is really not great.

Also like to +1 the comment above to extend the 80char limit

body:
I'd like to +1 migrating to the standard 4-space indentation. I've seen quite a few places in the tensorflow codebase with a mix of 2-space and 4-space indentations in the same file. This is really not great.

Also like to +1 the comment above to extend the 80char limit
